snippet: Video-game simulators have become important features of automakers' show displays.
abstract: Video-game simulators have become important features of automakers' show displays.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- With so many new vehicles vying for attention during press previews at the auto show, it's no longer sufficient to roll a car onstage through a fog bank. Automakers are turning to side exhibits that incorporate some aspect of virtual reality, usually involving driving simulators, to keep people interested in its products long after the fog machine is switched off.
